attributes.action: Seek Prosecution of MP's who have made fraudulent claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ignorance of the expenses rules (as of ignorance of the law) is NO DEFENCE.  If this were a benefit cheat, they would be prosecuted, so MPs should be no different.

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is a case to answer, and to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
